tool.description.worldgen_visualizer: Quickly create, inspect, and regenerate chunks without loading a world.
tool.description.nemi_compiler: View and compile NBT Entity Model intermediary files (NEMi), produced by the PSWG plugin for entity modeling software, into NBT Entity Model files (NEM), and view existing NEM models.
tool.description.p3di_compiler: Compile P3D model intermediary files (P3Di), produced by the PSWG plugin for Blender, into P3D model files (P3D).
